title: Introduction
body_html:
Huly Webhook Integration: Comprehensive Implementation Guide

Welcome to the Huly Webhook Integration Guide

This comprehensive guide provides everything you need to implement robust webhook functionality in the Huly project management platform. Whether you're new to Huly development or an experienced contributor, this documentation will guide you through the complete process of adding webhook capabilities.

What You'll Learn

üîç Current State Analysis

  • Understand the existing standalone webhook service
  • Learn Huly's core architecture and patterns
  • Identify integration points and opportunities

üìã Requirements and Implementation

  • Define webhook functionality scope and requirements
  • Choose between standalone and integrated approaches
  • Follow a detailed phase-by-phase implementation plan

üõ† Technical Implementation

  • Database models using Huly's decorator system
  • API endpoints following Huly conventions
  • Webhook delivery systems with retry logic
  • Security and authentication mechanisms

üë®‚Äçüíª Development Best Practices

  • Huly-specific development patterns
  • Plugin architecture and trigger systems
  • Code examples from existing implementations
  • Testing strategies and debugging techniques

üöÄ Production Deployment

  • Docker configuration and security hardening
  • Monitoring and observability setup
  • Performance optimization techniques
  • Troubleshooting and maintenance

Target Audience

This guide is designed for:

  • Developers new to Huly - Comprehensive explanations of architecture and patterns
  • Experienced Huly developers - Specific implementation details and integration points
  • DevOps/System administrators - Deployment and configuration guidance
  • Project managers - Understanding webhook capabilities and use cases

Prerequisites

Before starting, you should have:

  • Basic understanding of TypeScript and Node.js
  • Familiarity with REST APIs and webhooks concepts
  • Access to a Huly development environment
  • Understanding of Docker and containerization (for deployment)

How to Use This Guide

For New Implementations

  1. Start with Chapter 1 to understand the current state
  2. Review Chapter 2 for requirements and scope
  3. Follow Chapter 3 for the implementation plan
  4. Use Chapters 4-5 for detailed technical implementation
  5. Deploy using Chapter 6 guidelines

For Existing Standalone Service Users

  1. Review Chapter 1 to understand integration opportunities
  2. Check Chapter 3 for migration strategies
  3. Use Chapter 6 for production optimization

For Learning Huly Development

  1. Focus on Chapter 5 for development patterns
  2. Study the code examples throughout the guide
  3. Practice with the provided implementation templates

Key Benefits

Getting Started

Ready to begin? Start with Chapter 1: Overview and Current State to understand the foundation of webhook integration in Huly.

This guide is maintained as part of the Huly project documentation. For updates and contributions, please refer to the project repository.
